title: [LOVE] Ep. 34: How to Create Attraction w/ Mat Boggs
description:
This week, Ash interviews best-selling author, speaker, and expert dating coach, Mat Boggs, about how to create, find, and keep attraction. Mat dives into the attractive mindset and explains that certain traits that might be getting you ahead in business and your career might be sabotaging your relationships. Through a series of touching stories, Mat shows us that in order to treat others with love, you must first love yourself, allow yourself to feel vulnerable, be your own best friend, and practice self-assertiveness.

Mat's Website: www.crackingthemancode.com

Free e-book for Listeners: 5 Feminine Qualities that High-Value Men Find Irresistible 

Mat's Book: Cracking the Man Code

Book Mentioned: Project Everlasting
